Description: Loin-cloth composed of leather and green and black glazed composition beads, in the shape of ox-hide, side pieces made of network, 3 beads on leather string pendant from 1 side, both sides damaged, 5 fragments from same piece of shells and leather, see item 2.
Curator's comments: Nicholson and Shaw, Ancient Egyptian Materials and Technology (Cambridge 2000), p. 311
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
